comment.author: 28152668@N04
comment._content: Are you certain this is in the rotunda? I've checked usual sources and can't seem to figure out which mural they are cleaning.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content: I believe it's the Declaration mural by Barry Faulkner in the rotunda. Here's a link to info on the two rotunda murals: www.archives.gov/exhibits/charters/charters_murals.html and here's a closer view of the Declaration mural: www.archives.gov/exhibits/charters/charters_mural_declara.... - Jill U.S. National Archives
